abstract.t: A framework is given to coordinate the worldwide effort of RFC translation into various languages. Translated RFCs will be encoded in 7bit ISO 2022 and will have a name 'TRFC NNNN-LLL-MM' where 'NNNN' is the RFC number of the original RFC, 'LLL' is the language tag and 'MM' is the sequence number to identify different translations. Formatting rules similar to ASCII RFCs are also described.
